items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality sweater. Runs a little small. Peplum sits up a little high
items.body: This is a very nice quality sweater - the knit is of a finer gauge, and the material feels like wool. But it is soft. The styling is really sweet with big bell sleeves and a peplum at the waist. The fit was a little iffy - I’m usually between a small and medium. On this sweater the bust seemed tight (buttons starting to pull) and the peplum seemed to be placed too high. So maybe I just needed a larger size. But the shoulders and armlength were great. and the peplum was generous- might be too generous (read that as “makes me look fat”) on the large. It is very cute. I received the white sweater and will wear it either open over a dress, or with jeans and a cami underneath. The red would look stunning over the holidays — hmm, I’ll have to purchase another! Read more
items.author: Tennessee Vol

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars would purchase again
items.body: Runs a little small but still fit nicely. Good quality for the price. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Color, Quality But Fabric Might Be An Issue
items.body: The things I like about this sweater… The color is just as pictured. It’s rich and perfect for fall. The buttons are large with swirled coloring and they provide an extra. The sleeves are very pretty and flattering to the arm. And, it’s machine washable per the tag. This, however, could be a hard sweater to wear if your skin is sensitive. I found it a little itchy on my arms. The length and hence where it flares is not flattering on my waist. Someone with a longer and smaller waist would wear it better. I am an M, size 8, but slightly larger in the chest so I had trouble getting the center button to sit flat, although the fabric is stretchy. The sweater seems well made. I took off 1 star for the itchy fabric, and 1 for the overall look. Read more
items.author: Lilybean

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vivid color and true to size
items.body: I absolutely adore this cardigan. It transitions from business to casual so easily, so I can wear this cardigan at work or out on a date night. The size is true, and the small fits me perfectly. It did not shrink in the wash, and the peplum hem plus the bell sleeves are just so unique. I get so many compliments on this cardigan! It is a medium thickness and I love wearing this on top of button downs. Read more
items.author: Crystal Ellwood

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Mucho plisado en el vuelo
items.author: luvia gonzalez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Xx red
items.body: Sooooo cute. I got all the compliments and i love how cozy and stretchy it feels. The sleeves dont lose their shape even while i drive or work they stay in place and the bell shape stays in place and looks so elegant no matter what i am doing. I got L i am 5'3 150-160 lbs. It fits perfect even with the buttons buttoned up. I love it open though thats how i am wearing it. Ill post a photo of the buttons. This is kind of hot because its thick and feels like a blanket. Feels like wool and its not itchy. For $25 i wish they also had a black! Read more
items.author: Wutangtattoo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute.
items.body: I gave this smaller sweater to a petite woman. She liked the fabric and construction but it was a bit short on her and the flared part made her feel heavy in that area. For the right body this is a great sweater. Read more
items.author: Jabler

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, White, Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
